original: apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= m). - auto. - apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= l * m). ++ apply Nat.mul_le_mono_r. apply Nat.lt_le_incl. apply Nat.div_lt_upper_bound with (b:=2). * auto with arith. * rewrite <- Nat.mul_assoc. apply Nat.lt_le_incl. apply Hb_nat. ++ apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= 2 * l * m). * apply Nat.mul_le_mono_l. apply Hb_nat. * apply Nat.le_refl.
